scripts.start: cp src/frontend/contractsData/localhost/* src/frontend/contractsData/ && npm run cleanup && NODE_ENV=local parcel src/index.html --open
scripts.build: cp src/frontend/contractsData/localhost/* src/frontend/contractsData/ && npm run cleanup && NODE_ENV=local npm run parcel:build
scripts.build:dev:bsc: cp src/frontend/contractsData/bsc_testnet/* src/frontend/contractsData/ && npm run cleanup && NODE_ENV=development.bsc npm run parcel:build
scripts.build:dev:meter: cp src/frontend/contractsData/meter_testnet/* src/frontend/contractsData/ && npm run cleanup && NODE_ENV=development.meter npm run parcel:build
scripts.build:dev:oasis: cp src/frontend/contractsData/emerald_testnet/* src/frontend/contractsData/ && npm run cleanup && NODE_ENV=development.oasis npm run parcel:build
scripts.build:prod:bsc: cp src/frontend/contractsData/bsc_mainnet/* src/frontend/contractsData/ && npm run cleanup && NODE_ENV=production.bsc npm run parcel:build
scripts.build:prod:meter: cp src/frontend/contractsData/meter_mainnet/* src/frontend/contractsData/ && npm run cleanup && NODE_ENV=production.meter npm run parcel:build
scripts.build:prod:oasis: cp src/frontend/contractsData/emerald_mainnet/* src/frontend/contractsData/ && npm run cleanup && NODE_ENV=production.oasis npm run parcel:build
scripts.deploy: env $(cat .env) npx hardhat run src/backend/scripts/deploy.js --network localhost
scripts.deploy:dev:bsc: env $(cat .env) npx hardhat run src/backend/scripts/deploy.js --network bsc_testnet
scripts.deploy:dev:meter: env $(cat .env) npx hardhat run src/backend/scripts/deploy.js --network meter_testnet
scripts.deploy:dev:oasis: env $(cat .env) npx hardhat run src/backend/scripts/deploy.js --network emerald_testnet
scripts.deploy:prod:bsc: env $(cat .env) npx hardhat run src/backend/scripts/deploy.js --network bsc_mainnet
scripts.deploy:prod:meter: env $(cat .env) npx hardhat run src/backend/scripts/deploy.js --network meter_mainnet
scripts.deploy:prod:oasis: env $(cat .env) npx hardhat run src/backend/scripts/deploy.js --network emerald_mainnet
scripts.update:local: env $(cat .env) npx hardhat run src/backend/scripts/upgrade.js --network localhost
scripts.update:dev:bsc: env $(cat .env) env $(cat .env) npx hardhat run src/backend/scripts/upgrade.js --network localhost
